briefdescription.para: Domain this instance is defined over.
Compute device used by the instance.
Map from Sym instances to REAL valued ParticleDat instances.
Map from Sym instances to INT valued ParticleDat instances.
Sym of ParticleDat storing particle positions.
Sym of ParticleDat storing particle cell ids.
Sym of ParticleDat storing particle MPI ranks.
ParticleSpec of all the ParticleDats of this ParticleGroup.
Layer compression instance for dats when particles are removed from cells.

detaileddescription.para: Returns true if the passed version is behind and was updated.

briefdescription.para: Explicitly free a ParticleGroup without relying on out-of-scope.

detaileddescription.para: Construct a new ParticleGroup.

parameterdescription.para: ParticleSpec that describes the ParticleDat instances required.
SYCLTargetSharedPtr to use as compute device.

detaileddescription.para: Add a ParticleDat to the ParticleGroup after construction.
Add a ParticleDat to the ParticleGroup after construction.

Add particles to the ParticleGroup. Any rank may add particles that exist anywhere in the domain. This call is collective across the ParticleGroup and ranks that do not add particles should not pass any new particle data.

Add particles to the ParticleGroup. Any rank may add particles that exist anywhere in the domain. This call is collective across the ParticleGroup and ranks that do not add particles should not pass any new particle data.

parameterdescription.para: New particle data to add to the ParticleGroup.

detaileddescription.para: Add particles only to this MPI rank. It is assumed that the added particles are in the domain region owned by this MPI rank. If not, see ParticleGroup::add_particles.
Get the total number of particles on this MPI rank.
Determine if the ParticleGroup contains a ParticleDat of a given name.

simplesect.para: True if ParticleDat exists on this ParticleGroup.

detaileddescription.para: Determine if the ParticleGroup contains a ParticleDat of a given name.

simplesect.para: True if ParticleDat exists on this ParticleGroup.

detaileddescription.para: Template for get_dat method called like: ParticleGroup::get_dat(Sym<REAL>("POS")) for a real valued ParticleDat.

parameterdescription.para: Check if the dat exists, default true.

detaileddescription.para: Users are recomended to use "get_dat" instead. Enables access to the ParticleDat instances using the subscript operators.
Users are recomended to use "get_dat" instead. Enables access to the ParticleDat instances using the subscript operators.
Get a CellData instance that holds all the particle data for a ParticleDat for a cell.

parameterdescription.para: Sym<REAL> indicating which ParticleDat to access.

detaileddescription.para: Get a CellData instance that holds all the particle data for a ParticleDat for a cell.

parameterdescription.para: Sym<INT> indicating which ParticleDat to access.

memberdef.argsstring: (const int npart, const std::vector< INT > &cells, const std::vector< INT > &layers)
memberdef.name: remove_particles

detaileddescription.para: Remove particles from the ParticleGroup.
Remove particles from the ParticleGroup.

parameterdescription.para: Device accessible array of particle cells.
Device accessible array of particle layers(rows).

detaileddescription.para: Get the number of particles in a cell.

simplesect.para: Number of particles in queried cell.

detaileddescription.para: Get the ParticleSpec of the ParticleDats stored in this ParticleGroup.
Use the MPI ranks in the first component of the MPI rank dat to move particles globally using the MeshHierarchy of the mesh in the domain.
Must be called collectively on the ParticleGroup.
Use the MPI ranks in the second component of the MPI rank dat to move particles to neighbouring ranks using the neighbouring ranks defined on the mesh.
Must be called collectively on the ParticleGroup.

Perform a global move using non-negative MPI ranks in the first component of the MPI rank dat. Then bin moved particles into local cells to obtain any required ranks for the local move. Second perform a local move to move particles based on the MPI rank stored in the second component of the MPI rank dat.
Must be called collectively on the ParticleGroup.
Number of bytes required to store the data for one particle.

simplesect.para: Number of bytes required to store one particle.

detaileddescription.para: Move particles between cells using the cell ids stored in the cell id dat.
Copy the particle counts per cell from the position ParticleDat to the npart cell array of the ParticleGroup.
Print particle data for all particles for the specified ParticleDats. Empty cells are not printed.

parameterdescription.para: Sym<REAL> or Sym<INT> instances that indicate which particle data to print.

detaileddescription.para: Remove a ParticleDat from the ParticleGroup

parameterdescription.para: Sym object that refers to a ParticleDat

detaileddescription.para: Remove a ParticleDat from the ParticleGroup

parameterdescription.para: Sym object that refers to a ParticleDat

detaileddescription.para: Fundamentally a ParticleGroup is a collection of ParticleDats, domain and a compute device.
